dublin_core.dcvalue: Mobile application that assesses CVD risk, provides basic health education materials on key CVD risk factors and directs users to other locations for more advanced CVD risk factor screenings.
community members, CHW, DCHW, National Health System
Bryan Weichelt, IT Project Manager, Biomedical Informatics Research Center | Tel: +1-715-389-7707, Email: weichelt.bryan@marshfieldclinic.org
The Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) Office of the National Coordinator for Health IT (ONC)
Data collection and reporting, Client education and behavior change communication, Non-communicable Diseases
